message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product. Given its unique value proposition, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm initially offering it at $1,300,000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer but $1,300,000 is significantly higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product.  I'm confident this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but the value of this product extends far beyond its price point. It offers unique advantages that justify a higher investment.  I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000.

Alice, while I understand the value you place on this product, $1,150,000 remains beyond my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $950,000.  This offer reflects the value I see in the product and allows for a mutually beneficial agreement.
